attributes.description:
1st Installment December 2022
Here are some of what the team at Motus Select Kia Durban offers you in making the purchase of your new preowned car a positive and stress free one.
1)	We can tailor make a deal to suit you.
2)	In house 101-point check and AA Dekra road worthy are done on all our cars.
3)	In house Finance department offering you the best deal from the major banks.
4)	We also have loads of products to assist you while owning your car. Here are a few:
Service plans, maintenance plans, extended warranty, warranty booster, renew tech, tracking system, crystal fusion and safety film.
Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description:
How stunning does this 4×4 Fortuner look in gun metal grey? With an impressive list of features you can go places in this Toyota!!
Alloy wheels, aircon, tow bar, Hi-Lo 4×4 range selection, 7 seater, leather interior, radio/CD, electric windows, xenon lights, ABS, airbags, side steps, on board computer, mutli-functional steering wheel, bluetooth and power steering, the Vehicle has a full service history and balance of service plan up until 90,000km’s with agents. . If you are interested please send an inquiry. Please note that all vehicles sold are strictly first come, first serve basis. All our vehicles are sold with a comprehensive Dekra AA roadworthy certificate for peace of mind driving. FINANCE THROUGH ALL LEADING BANKS , NO DEPOSIT NEEDED , TRADE INS WELCOME.
